TopicTitle: SSTO that does a minmus flyby

Articles.Content:
yep you read that correctly i made a simple SSTO that easily does a minmus fly by and if i didnt have deadly re-entry or if i did a better job with the aerobrake it would have returned in one piece

enjoy! also that playlist contains all my other videos which are tutorials!

Niiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiice!

Btw are you Jesse's stoner friend Badger from Breaking Bad?
lol no im not but i do sorta talk and look like him, luckily for me i put the drugs down a long time ago and i am much smarter than Badger
There is a sub-forum for mission reports, which this thread now occupies. (Moved.)
sorry didnt know such a place existed now i do
why is no one leaving me with ideas for future tutorial builds?
